reviews.text: We stayed in february 2007 in Goche Ganas Lodge, and I can express that it is a beautiful place, it has a very good service, incredible food and facilities. The staff is extremely friendly. Very near to Windhoek, the lodge has several chalets very warms and well decorated. They are on a hill with a wonderful view of the valleys. The spa facilities are outstanding. It worth absolutely the price.....
reviews.title: Incredible beautiful place

reviews.text: I hope to come back soon.
reviews.title: Gocheganas Lodge
